events.title: Multiverse talk
events.content: Irene Cacares Munoz will talk about the transition from academia to industry after a master degree! Irene is currently working at Multiverse, and she graduated in 2021 UCL program -MSc in quantum technologies. We are happy to host Irene in-person on campus!

events.title: QML talk
events.content: A PhD student from Imperial will describe his research in quantum machine learning. Stay tuned for more details!
